notes: Fetch the full content of the Air Canada 'Travelling with your Pet' page; the sample did not include policy details.
Try accessing a text-only, print, or cached version to extract policy specifics (in-cabin eligibility, fees, crate and size limits, embargoes, breed restrictions, and cargo options).
If pet transport via cargo is needed, confirm details on the official Air Canada Cargo animals page linked from the main site.
